member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_DESC.Id
member.summary: A uniquely identifying the meta command.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_DESC.InitializationDirtyState
member.summary: Declares the command list states that are modified by the call to initialize the meta command. If all state bits are set, then that's equivalent to calling .

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_DESC.ExecutionDirtyState
member.summary: Declares the command list states that are modified by the call to execute the meta command. If all state bits are set, then that's equivalent to calling .
